title: Content Asset
description: Content asset such as image or video.

xdm:assetPerceptionID.title: Asset Perception ID
xdm:assetPerceptionID.description: Unique identifier of the asset perception.

xdm:assetGUID.title: Asset GUID
xdm:assetGUID.description: Global unique identifier of the asset.

xdm:assetType.title: Asset Type
xdm:assetType.description: Asset type such as image or video.

xdm:createdBy.title: Created By
xdm:createdBy.description: Name of the user who created this record

xdm:createdDate.title: Created Date
xdm:createdDate.description: Date when this record was created.

xdm:lastUpdatedDate.title: Last Updated Date
xdm:lastUpdatedDate.description: Date when this record was last modofied.

xdm:lastUpdatedBy.title: Last Updated By
xdm:lastUpdatedBy.description: User who last modified this record.

xdm:expirationDate.title: Expiration Date
xdm:expirationDate.description: Date when this record will expire.

xdm:orientation.title: Asset Orientation
xdm:orientation.description: Asset orientation such as landscape, portrait or square.

xdm:overallTone.title: Asset Overall Tone
xdm:overallTone.description: This gives the overall tone of the image.

xdm:foregroundColors.title: Asset Foreground Colors
xdm:foregroundColors.description: List of colors that cover the important objects/parts of the image. A maximum of 3 colors in the list.

xdm:backgroundColors.title: Asset Background Colors
xdm:backgroundColors.description: List of colors that cover the background in the image. A maximum of 3 colors in the list.

xdm:tags.title: Asset Tags
xdm:tags.description: List of tags present in the image/video.

xdm:scenes.title: Asset Scenes
xdm:scenes.description: Provides scenes of the image/video from the taxonomy of tags.

xdm:photographyStyles.title: Asset Photography Styles
xdm:photographyStyles.description: Provides photography styles of the image/video from the taxonomy of styles.

xdm:imageType.title: Image Type
xdm:imageType.description:
Type of an image from among:

photograph
sketch
painting
digital_cartoon
infographics
graphic_design
collage
software_screenshot

xdm:cameraPosition.title: Asset Camera Positions
xdm:cameraPosition.description:
For an image, there are 5 tags in this category out of which 1 is predicted depending on the position of the camera w.r.t. the subject of the image.
The 5 possible values are: 
 low angle shot
 eye level shot
 overhead view
 over the shoulder shot
 dutch angle shot

xdm:cameraProximity.title: Asset Camera Proximities
xdm:cameraProximity.description:
For an image, there are 3 tags in this category out of which 1 is predicted (as a single element list) depending on the proximity of the camera w.r.t subject. 

The 3 possible values are:

closeup shot
mid shot
long shot

xdm:emotions.title: Asset Emotions
xdm:emotions.description:
Emotions in an image from:

Anger
Scared
Sadness
Shame
Contentment
Happiness
Love
Pride
Contempt
Surprise

xdm:domain.title: Asset Domain
xdm:domain.description: Categories of videos, for example: How to tutorials, Education, Sales and Offers, etc.

xdm:products.title: Asset Products
xdm:products.description: List of products present in the video.

xdm:peopleCategories.title: Asset People Categories
xdm:peopleCategories.description: Provides tags of the image/video from the taxonomy of {person, man, woman, social group, crowd, people, boy, girl, kid}

xdm:persuasionStrategies.title: Asset Persuasion Strategies
xdm:persuasionStrategies.description:
Persuasion strategies that are present in the given image/video.

The possible values are: 

Social Identity
Social Proof
Authority
Concreteness
Foot in the Door
Overcoming Reactance
Reciprocity
Anchoring and Comparison
Social Impact
Scarcity
Anthropomorphism

xdm:visualContentDensity.title: Asset Visual Content Density
xdm:visualContentDensity.description: Low content density implies a small amount of information present per unit area of the image. This is measured by the average of the magnitudes of edge strengths of semantic edges. If the value is smaller than 0.01 for an image, it is labeled as having a Low content density, and anything below 0.05  but higher than 0.01 is labeled as Medium density.

xdm:visualAttentionSpread.title: Asset Visual Attention Spread
xdm:visualAttentionSpread.description: Attention spread refers to the degree to which the attention of a viewer is divided between different parts of a picture. This is measured by the number of salient blobs (connected components) present in the image weighted by their salience. A score of lower than 1.5 is considered a Low attention spread, and 3.5 or higher is labeled as High.

xdm:audioTypes.title: Asset Audio Types
xdm:audioTypes.description: There are 5 tags['music', 'speech', 'silence', 'special effects', 'ambience'] in this category, of which 1 or more can be predicted depending on the type of audio. It'll be empty if there's no audio.

xdm:audioGenre.title: Asset Audio genre
xdm:audioGenre.description: There are 21 classes in this category, of which 1 is predicted depending on the type of music. It'll be blank if there is no music.

xdm:audioGenreCategory.title: Asset Audio genre category
xdm:audioGenreCategory.description: There are 7 classes in this category, of which 1 is predicted depending on the type of music. It'll be blank if there is no music.

xdm:audioMood.title: Asset Audio mood
xdm:audioMood.description: There are 9 classes in this category, of which 1 is predicted depending on the type of music. It'll be blank if there is no music.

xdm:categories.title: Asset Categories
xdm:categories.description: There are 16 categories of which 1 is predicted depending on the category of the video. Some examples of categories include Sports, Sales and Offers, HowTo Tutorials, Music, etc.

xdm:lightingCondition.title: Lighting Condition
xdm:lightingCondition.description:
